title: Authors and Citation
text: Joan Kant. Maintainer.

title: Authors and Citation
text: Kant J (2024). scrnaseq.cellcomm: scrnaseq-cellcomm: package containing functions used GaitiLab/scrnaseq-cellcomm-pipeline. R package version 1.0.0, https://gaitilab.github.io/scrnaseq-cellcomm/.
code: @Manual{,   title = {scrnaseq.cellcomm: scrnaseq-cellcomm: package containing all functions used in the GaitiLab/scrnaseq-cellcomm-pipeline},   author = {Joan Kant},   year = {2024},   note = {R package version 1.0.0},   url = {https://gaitilab.github.io/scrnaseq-cellcomm/}, }

what: scrnaseq-cellcomm: package containing all functions used in the GaitiLab/scrnaseq-cellcomm-pipeline
title: scrnaseq-cellcomm: package containing all functions used in the GaitiLab/scrnaseq-cellcomm-pipeline
text: Package containing functions used scrnaseq-cellcomm-pipeline leveraged cell-cell communication analyses “Glioblastoma cells co-opt epigenetic regulators normal oligodendrocyte development brain infiltration”. Code reproduce analyses figures paper can found : https://github.com/GaitiLab/gbm_manuscript package can installed follows: details please check: scrnaseq-cellcomm-pipeline.
